Keep abreast of significant corporate, financial and political developments around the world.
Stay informed and spot emerging risks and opportunities with independent global reporting, expert
commentary and analysis you can trust.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Do I have to go back to work after lockdown? - BBC News
articles.description: With lockdown restrictions eased, people may start going back to work. But what are your rights?
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
The government has started easing lockdown restrictions, with more people now encouraged to start returning to work.
But for many, concerns remain about the risk of contracting the coronavirus once back in the workplace.

articles.title: Andrew Lloyd Webber's The Shows Must Go On series: CATS is latest show to be streamed for free - Evening Standard
articles.content:

articles.author: Vicki Newman
articles.title: Harry Styles' fans clamour to get their hands on $7 candle that 'smells like him' - Mirror Online
articles.description: The One Direction star's signature scent has apparently been captured in a candle that costs just $6.99, and his fans are desperate to get hold of one
articles.content:
Harry Styles ' fans are said to be desperate to get their hands on a $7 candle that smells just like him. 
Faithful followers of the former One Direction star, 26, reckon the Cashmere Vanilla candle created by US chain Target's brand Threshold has exactly ca… [+2060 chars]

articles.title: Dave Grohl says Post Malone’s Nirvana livestream “sounded great” - NME
articles.description: Dave Grohl has praised Post Malone's recent 'Post Malone x Nirvana tribute' livestream, in which the rapper performed a 75-minute set of Nirvana covers.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ellie Kirwin-Jones
articles.title: Amanda Holden opens up on 'excruciating' moment at Simon Cowell's house 'I bit the bullet' - Express
articles.description: AMANDA HOLDEN - who judges Britain's Got Talent alongside Simon Cowell, Alesha Dixon and David Walliams - has opened up about an 'excruciating' moment while she was around BGT co-star Simon's house.
articles.content:
Amanda went on to add: "Chris [her husband] and I had a baby born sleeping in an NHS hospital, and then the following year our lovely daughter Holly, our rainbow baby.
"But then I had an awful birth, I went into a coma so that was horrendous and they held Ch… [+370 chars]
